verses.roman:
eka sampradāye nāce nityānanda-rāye
advaita-ācārya nāce āra sampradāye

synonyms: eka sampradāye—in one group; nāce—dances; nityānanda-rāye—Lord Nityānanda; advaita-ācārya—Advaita Ācārya Prabhu; nāce—dances; āra—another; sampradāye—in a group.
translation: In one group Nityānanda Prabhu began to dance, and in another group Advaita Ācārya began to dance.
